attributes.title: 12/10 not recommend getting this app
attributes.review: This app is terrible. It lags and crashes more often than not. I thought the user interface design would be more extensive but to say the least it was very disappointing. I recommend saving the storage on your phone and skipping this app the next time you want to download it and stick to good the good olâ€™ interwebs.

attributes.title: This app suckssss

The app crashed and I started screaming so much I accidentally threw a child off the building. I downloaded the app whilst I was listening to the gummy bear album with music videos and extras. I got it before it came out. He is a homophobic and racist pig. and thatâ€™s on what, PERIODT.

attributes.title: App Keeps Crashing Among Other Issues
attributes.review: I opened the app for the first time and it immediately crashed. I tried one more time and it did it again. I gave up and opened another app and it crashed that one too. I've also noticed that most calls no longer get through and my iPhone's battery drains much, much, quicker. I was optimistic at first but now I'm very concerned.
